objects.text:
• SIGNATURE SOUND
• 100+ HOURS BATTERY
• FOLDABLE DESIGN
• PREMIUM BUILD

product_details.name: Marshall Major V On-Ear Bluetooth Headphone, Black
product_details.description:
- True icons never die; they just get better with time.
- Major V is no different.
- From its explosive Marshall signature sound to its everlasting design, every detail of these headphones has been painstakingly considered and refined.
- Featuring 100+ hours of wireless playtime combined with a rugged and foldable design, Major V is best paired with your next great adventure.

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a sleek and modern layout designed to showcase a premium headphone product. The background consists of a dark checked pattern overlaid with a subtle golden grid, giving the design an industrial and tech-savvy aesthetic. The brand name (`brand_name`) is prominently displayed in bold, uppercase golden text at the top-left to capture immediate attention. Below it, the model and product type are introduced in clean white font (`heading`). Key product highlights are listed in a bullet format (`features`) in the left-center. The price is emphasized in large golden text (`price`) followed by a bold call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`) inviting users to shop. The product image (`product_image`) is prominently placed on the right, creating balance in the composition.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Black: #1A1A1A
- Panel Gray: #252525
- Accent Gold: #D4AF37
- Text White: #FFFFFF
- CTA Text Black: #000000
product_color: The product image features a sleek and sophisticated black Marshall headphone, which utilizes a monochromatic black palette highlighted with subtle textures and accents. Matte Black (#1B1B1B) dominates the structure, giving it a bold, high-end look. The ear cup texture includes a slightly lighter Charcoal Black (#2E2E2E), adding tactile depth. The white Marshall logo (#FFFFFF) stands out sharply against the black, ensuring brand visibility. A matte Gold (#D4AF37) metal accent adds a premium, classic rock vibe. These colors blend seamlessly while each element is distinctly visible, creating an ideal palette for a luxurious, powerful, and modern advertisement banner.
